channel.title: How to exclude all three tor node some specific country
channel.description: How to exclude all three tor node some specific country. Like if i write ExcludeExitNodes {US} im exclude only last node but entry and middle still can have this country connection. Command ExcludeNodes {US} will block all 1-2-3 this country nodes?
